thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Issue Price For OncoArendi Therapeutics Shares Set At 29 Zlotys/Shr

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Issue Price For OncoArendi Therapeutics Shares Set At 29 Zlotys/Shr
text:
March 28 (Reuters) - ONCOARENDI THERAPEUTICS SA ( IPO-ORT.WA ):
* SAYS ISSUE PRICE FOR ITS SHARES IN IPO HAS BEEN SET AT 29 ZLOTYS PER SHARE
* RECEIVED DECLARATIONS FROM INVESTORS THAT ALL SHARES IN OFFER WILL BE ACQUIRED
* WITH 2 MILLION SERIES F SHARES IN OFFER TOTAL VALUE OF OFFER WILL AMOUNT TO 58 MILLION ZLOTYS
* 140,000 SHARES WILL BE OFFERED TO INDIVIDUAL INVESTORS AND 1,860,000 SHARES WILL BE OFFERED TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS
* ONCOARENDI THERAPEUTICS SET MAXIMUM SHARE PRICE AT 33 ZLOTYS FOR OFFERED SHARES IN ITS IPO OFFER ON MARCH, 16
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
